Title: Ant Man And The Wasp Quantumania

Together with his partner Hope van Dyne, the daughter of the famous physicist and entomologist Hank Pym, who developed the Ant-Man costume, Scott once again saves the world from an impending threat.

Title: Hayaller Ülkesi
Actors: Miranda Tapsell, Ross Noble, Kate Murphy
Plot: Little opossum Kerry dreams of celebrating Christmas with snow, because this is what creates a real holiday spirit, a cozy atmosphere and indescribable children's delight! Fortunately, there is a Tree nearby that can fulfill wishes. You just need to find a flower and say what you want. Everything is very simple, but something went wrong - and everything around froze, and the Tree itself was dying. Now Kerry must, by all means, correct what she has done.

Actors: Adam Driver, Ariana Greenblatt, Chloe Coleman

Title: Zona
Actors: Majid Guseynov, Tural Asadov, Faig Mirzayev, Taleh Yuzbayov, Agil M Guliyev
Plot: The main character gets a job in one of the city's collection companies. He collects debts from people who refuse to pay banks. Everything is going well until one of the borrowers is found dead. The police sees the main character at the scene of the incident and arrests him. Since all the evidence is against him, the court deprives him of his freedom. The main part of the film takes place in a place reminiscent of Guantanamo prison. The hero tries to escape from there and prove his innocence. But escape from this prison is impossible.
Subtitle: Azerbaijani
